attacks.name: Tail Lash
attacks.special: All Characters within 4" are targets of this attack. If Critical Hit is made, the target Character is thrown D6 inches in a direction of the Tarrasque player's choosing. This Character is Prone.

attacks.name: Earthquake Stomp
attacks.special: Hits are doubled if the Target is Prone.

attacks.name: Carapace Crush
attacks.special: Hits may be split between up to five target Characters. +1 Power if the target is Prone. The Tarrasque may only Move again on a successful Easy Feat to get up.
